text_logic_form: Point $A$ is the midpoint of one leg of the trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $B$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid $QRST$.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $A$ is the midpoint of one leg of the trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $B$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid $QRST$.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TC$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $TC$ is repeated as $20$ units.
The measure of angle $CTQ$ is $120$ degrees.
The measure of angle $QRC$ is $45$ degrees.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $Q$ and $T$.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $QR$, $QT$, and $RC$, forming the trapezoid and its diagonals.
